text: PCS switching center: In personal communications service, a facility that (a) supports access-independent call control/service control, and connection control (switching) functions, and (b) is responsible for interconnection of access and network systems to support end-to-end services. Note 1: The PCS switching center represents a collection of one or more network elements. Note 2: The term "center" does not imply a physical location. ==References== Category:Mobile technology
title: PCS switching center
